EmailTemplate.name: Failed-Charged Off ICCU
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Recent Application with ICCU
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Valued Member,
Thank you for your online application for a Free Checking account with Idaho Central Credit Union. Unfortunately you do not qualify to open additional accounts due to a charged-off account you have with us currently. The charged-off amount would need to be paid in full before you could qualify for future services. If you have questions, please feel free to contact us at 1-800-456-5067 using reference number <CollabJob>.
Thank you,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
Idaho Central Credit Union
P.O. Box 2469
Pocatello, ID 83206
d: (208) 239-3000 | f: (208) 239-3055
